bot_no_permission: Ye do not be havin' permission t' use this command
bot_botspam_redirect: This command be scuttled here! Please 'ave a go using it in <#%s>.
bot_cooldown_redirect: %s, please cool down mateys! %s seconds left.
bot_generic_error: Somethin' sailed wrong, n' th' error be logged
bot_not_registered: %s has not registered wit' me yet! Try `%shelp register`.
bot_mika_error: Somethin' sailed wrong grabbin' data from OpenDota. Please give a go again.
bot_wrong_data: Not enough data fer this command!
admin_display_disabled_commands_none: No scuttled commands in this channel.
admin_disable_list: All scuttled commands in this channel: %s
admin_disable_none: No scuttled commands in this channel.
admin_locale_failure: Can't set t' this language! Available langauges: %s
prommr_success: Available regions: %s. Or filter by country:
prommr_header: Top 10 scallywags sorted by Solo MMR in %s
sub_invalid_syntax: Please mention one pirate t' subscribe to.
sub_failure: Somethin' sailed wrong insertin' this subscription. Th' error be logged.
sub_team_id: Please provide a team ID. Check out <https://www.dotabuff.com/esports/teams> fer a list o' teams.
sub_league_id: Please provide a league ID. Check out <https://www.dotabuff.com/esports/leagues> fer a list o' leagues.
sub_no_type: Type be a required argument that be missing. Currently available type(s): %s
sub_wrong_type: This type o' subscription nay be supported. Currently available type(s): %s
sub_wrong_newsfeed: This newsfeed subscription nay be available. Available newsfeed subscriptions: %s
unsub_message_1: Current subscriptions in this channel be owned by %s:
unsub_message_3: T' unsubscribe from a subscription, type th' number associated wit' th' subscription. This gunna time out in 60 seconds.
unsub_message_4: Use `%sunsub nuke` t' clear all subscriptions from this channel.
unsub_out_of_range: Index out o' range. Give a go at a different number.
unsub_no_feeds: %s has no feeds subscribed t' in this channel.
trivia_wrong_channel: Try this command in the trivia channel! <#%s>
trivia_no_channel: This ser'er nay be havin' a designated trivia channel! Try `%shelp admin trivia`.
info_description: A Dota 2 related bot. Contact %s fer support and questions!
restart_trivia_message: The bot is scuttled fer an update. Wait a ~30 seconds and type `--trivia start` again. Sorry fer the inconvenience!
history_with_wrong_data: Nay be enough or too much data provided fer this command! Please only specify one scallywag.
lastmatch_no_match: Couldna find a match with these paramaterrrs.
matches_embed_title: Use `%smatchinfo` t' check on a specific match.
mmr_in_progress: Gatherin'  MMR data. This could take up t' %s.
mmr_all_title: Top 15 scallywags sorted by Solo MMR in %s
register_steam_down: Steam be down or registering be disabled at the moment, please try again laterrr.
register_no_id: ID missing or invalid ID provided.
register_private_account: This steam account is private, or hasn' signed up for OpenDota yet! I can't register it.
register_no_steam_id: I couldna find a steam ID associated with this scallywag!
register_dm_1: Please check yer steam friend requests. Ye should recieve a request from me.
register_dm_2: On acceptance, I will prompt ye fer a code, please send me this: `%s`
register_dm_3: This code is case sensitive and be expirin' in 10 minutes.
register_dm_5: If ye nay be gettin' a friend request, try sendin' me a request as well: <%s>
unregister_no_account: Ye don't be havin' an account with me.
unregister_success: Deleted. Sorry t' see ye go... ðŸ˜¢
ability_not_found_conflicts: Ability nay be found. Possible conflicts: %s
guide_no_guides: Couldna find any guides fer this hero.
patch_message_1: Use â—€ and â–¶ t' scroll between patches.
help_instruction: Use `%shelp <name>` to find out more about a specific command.
help_cmd_prommr_args_0: `region`: filter by a specific region, either americas, se_asia, china, or europe
help_cmd_prommr_args_1: `countrycode`: filter by a two character country code, fer example `us`
help_cmd_prommr_desc: Shows a leaderboard o' MMR accordin' to Valve's leaderboards. Provide an invalid argument fer a list o' countries and regions.
help_cmd_sub_args_0: `type`: the type o' subscription, be player, team, league, or newsfeed
help_cmd_sub_args_1: `id`: the identifier fer the type o' subscription. Be a player id, team id, league id, or newsfeed name.
help_cmd_sub_desc: Subscribe t' multiple feeds o' news or matches in this channel.
help_cmd_twitch_args_1: `streams`: returns top 5 streams in english. filter t' other speaks with a two character country code.
help_cmd_twitch_desc: Some commands related t' Dota 2 activity on twitch.tv.
help_cmd_unsub_args_0: `nuke`: if used with nuke, all subscriptions by anyone in this channel be deleted.
help_cmd_unsub_desc: Interactively removes yer subscriptions from a channel.
help_cmd_admin_args_0: `botspam <#channel>`: allows a certain channel t' ignore cooldowns n' disabled commands.
help_cmd_admin_args_1: `cooldowns <channel or member> <time in seconds>`: set ser'er wide cooldowns for channels or scallywags.
help_cmd_admin_args_2: `disable <command(s)>`: turns cert'n commands off in the current channel.
help_cmd_admin_args_3: `enable <command(s)>`: turns cert'n commands on in the current channel.
help_cmd_admin_args_4: `locale <code>`: changes bot's speak t' a different one. use command by itself t' see a list o' available langauges.
help_cmd_admin_args_5: `prefix <new prefix>`: allows the bot t' respond t' a different prefix. it be still respond to `--`.
help_cmd_admin_args_6: `trivia <channel>`: enables the trivia game in a certain channel. use `here` t' use the current channel, or `none` t' disable it.
help_cmd_courage_desc: Returns a random item build. see <http://web.archive.org/web/20161219221614/http://divinecourage.dy.fi//> fer rules, or make yer own!
help_cmd_ping_desc: Returns the time between when the bot be recievin' yer message and the bot's message be sent.
help_cmd_pong_desc: Returns the last heartbeat latency measure.
help_cmd_trivia_args_1: `stop`: stops the trivia game, if it be running.
help_cmd_trivia_args_2: `top`: returns leaderboard o' trivia scores in this ser'er.
help_cmd_trivia_args_3: `top all`: returns every trivia score in the bot.
help_cmd_trivia_args_4: `points [<member>]`: returns yer trivia points. type or mention a name t' check on someone else.
help_cmd_trivia_args_5: `stats`: some statistics about the trivia game.
help_cmd_help_desc: How did ye get t' Davy Jones' locker?
help_cmd_info_desc: Returns some information about the bot.
help_cmd_shardinfo_desc: Shows information on the shards of the bot.
help_cmd_usage_desc: Shows how many times each command has been used.
help_cmd_history_filters_0: `with <member>`: show yer hist'ry with another registered scallywag.
help_cmd_history_filters_1: `as <hero>`: show yer hist'ry as a certain hero.
help_cmd_history_filters_2: `of <member>`: *optional* when used with the `as` filter, override the search for yer ID with thems.
help_cmd_history_desc: NOTE: using `of <member> with <member>` nay be workin' as o' now.
help_cmd_lastmatch_filters_0: `with <member>`: *optional* adds a scallywag filter t' the search fer yer latest match.
help_cmd_lastmatch_filters_1: `as <hero>`: *optional* adds a hero filter to the search for your latest match.
help_cmd_lastmatch_filters_2: `of <member>`: *optional* adds a scallywag filter, and removes yer ID from the search.
help_cmd_lastmatch_desc: Get yer last match. Multiple filters can be applied. For scallywag filters, more than one scallywag may be specified.
help_cmd_matches_filters_0: `with <member>`: *optional* adds a scallywag filter to the search for matches.
help_cmd_matches_filters_1: `as <hero>`: *optional* adds a hero filter to the search for matches.
help_cmd_matches_filters_2: `of <member>`: *optional* adds a scallywag filter, and removes yer ID from the search.
help_cmd_matches_desc: Get yer last 12 matches. Multiple filters can be applied. Fer scallywag filters, more than one scallywag may be specified.
help_cmd_matchinfo_args_0: `matchid`: a match ID, dotabuff link or opendota link t' search fer.
help_cmd_matchinfo_desc: Gets a specific match n' displays it.
help_cmd_mmr_args_1: `all`: *optional* Use this argument t' retrieve a leaderboard o' the current ser'er.
help_cmd_mmr_desc: Retrieves MMR data from OpenDota for a scallywag, for the server, or for ye'self.
help_cmd_playerinfo_desc: Show a summary o' a scallywag's profile. Can be used without arguments t' find yer own.
help_cmd_register_usage: %sregister <friend ID OR OpenDota link OR Dotabuff link OR Steam link>
help_cmd_register_desc: Accepts a steam profile link or a dotabuff/opendota link. The bot account be sendin' ye a friend request on steam along with a direct message on discord with instructions. **Make sure yer steam account is public fer all t' see and ye have discord set t' accept direct messages from other scallywags before trying this!**
help_cmd_unregister_desc: Removes yer account with the bot.
help_cmd_ability_args_0: `name`: Either the name o' the ability, or the hero name along with the default key (qwedfr).
help_cmd_ability_desc: Be returnin' information about an ability.
help_cmd_guide_desc: Be returnin' a Torte De Lini guide fer a hero.
help_cmd_hero_desc: Be returnin' some stats and a list o' abilities fer a hero.
help_cmd_item_desc: Be returnin' infomration about an item.
help_cmd_patch_desc: Be returnin' an interactive list o' patch notes fer a hero.
help_cmd_talents_desc: Be returnin' the talents fer a specific hero.
live_no_match: You aren't watching a match in this channel! Please try `%slive list`.
live_match_finished: This match is completed! You can look at its details with `%smatchinfo %s`.
live_list_footer: Use `%slive watch <match_id>` to start watching a game in this channel.
live_no_hero: That hero isn't in this game!
nextmatch_success: Watching for %s's next match, and posting it to this channel.
ability_multiple_conflicts: Multiple conflicts found. React with a number to choose an ability.
item_multiple_conflicts: Multiple conflicts found. React with a number to choose an item.
help_cmd_admin_args_7: `threshold <number between 1 and 5>`: sets the amount of people from this server that the bot will consider a stack for `--sub stacks`.
help_cmd_admin_args_8: `subrole <role name>`: sets the role to subscribe to. all members who have this role will have their matches posted to the channel you run this command in.
help_cmd_live_args_0: `list`: shows a list of the top 5 live league games.
help_cmd_live_args_1: `watch <match_id>`: watches a current game in this channel.
help_cmd_live_args_2: `info`: shows a summary of the current game.
help_cmd_live_args_3: `talents <hero>`: shows the talent choices of a hero in the current game.
help_cmd_live_args_4: `hero <hero>`: shows a summary of the provided hero, as well as item choices and skill build.
help_cmd_cleanup_desc: Deletes a bunch of messages sent by the bot in the channel. Not guaranteed to work.
help_footer: **Note**: Do not include `[]` or `<>` when using commands. They are there to differ between actual text and things you should replace.
help_cmd_nextmatch_desc: Waits for the registered user you mention to finish their game, then posts it.
bot_register_error: I can't send you direct messages! Please enable direct messaging from this server so I can complete the registration process.
info_help_server_text: Visit the support server if you have any questions about listen-bot. There is also a FAQ channel that might answer your question. %s
help_cmd_twenty_desc: Shows some statistics from your last twenty matches.
help_cmd_leaderboard_desc: Shows a leaderboard of winrates with certain optional filters.
help_cmd_leaderboard_filters_0: `as <hero>`: shows everyone's winrate with a hero
help_cmd_leaderboard_filters_1: `with <member>`: shows everyone's winrate with a member
